metadata.description: Showcasing the gorgeous good-girl pin-up art of Omar Dogan, Girl Seven features a cast of seven lovely ladies, all designed by Omar Dogan in a variety of themes such as swimsuits, martial arts, sports, goth, uniforms, and more. Over 80 all-new, full-color pin-ups have been created exclusively for this volume, plus rough sketches, character profiles, and creator commentary throughout the book.
metadata.name: Omar Dogan's Girl Seven
